name: Sigma
description:
Sigma

Sigma is a Figma plugin of automatically generate SwiftUI code from Figma


Video

Document

GitHub


Supported

  • VStack
  • HStack
  • LazyVGrid
  • LazyHGrid
  • Image(systemName:)
  • AsyncImage
  • Text
  • TextField
  • Button
  • Divider
  • Spacer
  • ScrollView
  • List


and some modifiers too.

  5. ğŸ”œPaste SwiftUI Code to Xcode from clipboard
  6. ğŸ› Run it
